document.docAuthor: Santos, Bianca Tamires Silva Dos, Silva, Valeria Juliete Da & Fernandes, Jose Antonio Marin
document.masterDocTitle: Revision of Ascra with proposition of the bifida species group and description of two new species (Hemiptera: Pentatomidae: Edessinae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Revision of Ascra with proposition of the bifida species group and description of two new species (Hemiptera: Pentatomidae: Edessinae)

heading.emphasis:
Key to species of bifida group of
Ascra

paragraph.keyLead:
1 . Arms of the anterior bifurcation of metasternal process flatted dorsoventrally ( Figs. 31, 32 ); corium almost transparent; legs with small black macules at base of setae (
Fig. 63
)......................................................
abdita

- Arms of the anterior bifurcation of metasternal process subcylindrical or flattened laterally (
Figs. 1 −2
, 9−10 , 25−26 , 39−40 ,
46− 47
); corium translucent brown; legs not maculate (
Figs. 59 −62, 64− 65
)....................................... 2

6 . Scutellum with a wide yellow stripe on lateral margins, apex punctate (
Fig. 58
); ventral rim with a narrow medial excavation hiding parameres in ventral view (
Fig. 50
).......................................................
vluteum
n. sp.

- Scutellum with a narrow yellow stripe on anterior margin, apex not punctate (
Fig. 57
); ventral rim widely excavated medially leaving parameres partially visible in ventral view (
Fig. 43
)...................................
flavoscutellata
n. sp.
